subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: After losing star guard Marcus Smart to suspension, No. 19 Oklahoma State faces a daunting pair of games this week, traveling to No. 15 Texas before hosting No. 21 Oklahoma.
snippet: After losing star guard Marcus Smart to suspension, No. 19 Oklahoma State faces a daunting pair of games this week, traveling to No. 15 Texas before hosting No. 21 Oklahoma.
